head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

sentences.english: One day she helped me kill a huge rat that was hanging around our house.
sentences.chinese: 一天她幫我殺死了一隻老在我家探頭探腦的大老鼠。
